Convert x to a standard score

Source: R/main.R
x2standard.Rd

Convert x to a standard score

Usage

x2standard(
  x,
  mu_x = mean(x, na.rm = T),
  sigma_x = stats::sd(x, na.rm = T),
  mu_new = 100,
  sigma_new = 15,
  digits = ifelse(sigma_new == 1, 2, 0)
)

Arguments

x

a numeric vector

mu_x

mean of current scores

sigma_x

standard deviation of current scores

mu_new

mean of new scores

sigma_new

standard deviation of new scores

digits

rounding digits

Value

numeric vector

Examples

x2standard(13, mu_x = 10, sigma_x = 3)
#> [1] 115
